chapter.title: Basic Troubleshooting

note.para: Reviewers: This new chapter combines troubleshooting techniques from both recursive and authoritative sections, and needs a re-write so it's more symptom-based. Also awaiting feedback on top-3 most commonly seen problems. It is currently under heavy construction.

chapter.para: In this chapter, we are going to cover some basic troubleshooting techniques, common DNSSEC symptoms, and their solutions and causes. This is not a comprehensive "how to troubleshoot any DNS or DNSSEC problem" guide, because that in and of itself could easily be an entire book.
